| description    = [Player Name] -

I hope you've recovered from your ordeal at Magran's Teeth. Come see me at Imperial Command in the Brass Citadel when you return to Neketaka. The way to Ukaizo lies open before us, but I require your help with a final matter.

In glory, Hazanui Karū
